attributes.action: Re-introduce the Eurasian lynx and the Eurasian wolf to Scotland and New Forest
attributes.background: I think that re-introducing lynx and wolves to certain areas in the UK would bring back the previously native species that we pushed out due to our actions. Also, I think that they would keep the populations of roe and sika deer under control and help prevent a large deer problem.

rejection.details:
In Scotland, this would be the responsibility of the Scottish Government. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to take this action in England.
